Key Match Events: Willy Adames and Gary Sánchez hit back-to-back homers in the first inning
Brice Turang reached on a bunt single
William Contreras hit a solo shot in the third
Ryan McMahon's homer in the fourth was Colorado's only damage
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tobias Myers allowed just one run on four hits in six innings
Myers walked one and struck out 11, a new career high
Seven of his strikeouts came with his four-seam fastball
Myers issued a leadoff walk in the second to Michael Toglia and allowed a one-out single to Jake Cave, but he worked out of the jam to keep the game scoreless
Others: The Brewers snapped their three-game skid in Saturday's 5-2 win over the Rockies
Milwaukee (82-60) holds a 10-game lead over the Cubs (72-70) in the NL Central after Chicago’s 2-0 loss to the Yankees earlier Saturday
Tim Stebbins is a reporter/producer for MLB.com
